This is because some of the pyramid scheme’s recruiters won’t make any money, because they won’t recruit enough people, and there will be only a few of the people at the top who earn the big rewards.

chosen: I can answer this by saying that a crime scene typically contains at least two different kinds of DNA that are associated with evidence that can be used to convict someone of a crime: The genetic material that is left behind as a result of direct contact between the perpetrator and the victim, which is termed “touch DNA,” and evidence that has been left behind that was shed from the perpetrator, or transferred from them to the victim and which is termed “transfer DNA.” The removal of these two types of DNA evidence is primarily a matter of physical cleanup of the crime scene, or destruction of the items that were evidence of the crime.
